sentence: Around  240  captives  were  taken  in  the  Oct.  7  attack  that  killed  about  1,200  people,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
At  least  13,300  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  the  fighting  began,  according  to  the  Health  Ministry  in  Hamas-controlled  Gaza.
Israel's  military  also  said  that  three  of  the  dozens  of  soldiers  kidnapped  by  Hamas  on  Oct.  7  are  dead  and  that  Hamas  has  their  bodies,  but  didn't  give  further  details.
